mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, `password`, phone, `status`, create_time, update_time from user
